definitions: the activity of performing songs or tunes by making musical sounds with the voice

examples.text: the singing of hymns in Latin
my mother had a beautiful singing voice

shortDefinitions: activity of performing songs by making musical sounds with voice

definitions: melodious whistling and twittering sounds made by a bird or birds

examples.text: the cries of laughter from children are a pleasant counterpoint to the singing of blackbirds

shortDefinitions: melodious whistling and twittering sounds made by bird
